## Skill Gap Analysis

We compared our current team skills against the most in-demand job market skills for AI and analytics roles in 2024.

| Skill              | In Market Demand | Team Has It |
|-------------------|------------------|-------------|
| Python             | ✅               | ✅          |
| Spark              | ✅               | ✅          |
| AWS                | ✅               | ✅          |
| TF-IDF/NLP         | ✅               | ❌          |
| Power BI           | ✅               | ✅          |
| SQL                | ✅               | ✅          |

Our team is well-prepared for technical roles in data and AI, with strong coverage of cloud, analytics, and visualization tools. Future upskilling in NLP and advanced feature engineering is recommended.
